mapper.select: SELECT id, password, username, email, phone_num FROM as_user WHERE username = #{userName}

SELECT users.id, users.username, users.email, users.phone, users.`password`, users.enabled, authorities.authority FROM users LEFT JOIN authorities ON authorities.user_id = users.id WHERE users.username = #{userName} UNION SELECT users.id, users.username, users.email, users.phone, users.`password`, users.enabled, group_authorities.authority FROM users LEFT JOIN group_members ON group_members.user_id = users.id INNER JOIN group_authorities ON group_authorities.group_id = group_members.group_id WHERE users.username = #{userName}
